title: Grow Global Economic Identities
description: How can the community work together to address challenges based on economic identity as opposed to geographic constraints?

f6_assessments.q0:
This is a great proposal and will help other regions facing similar challenges to be able to contribute to the growth of Cardano.

I agree
f6_assessments.q1:
The cardano Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge but will do better if the requested Fund was much higher than the requested $150000
I agree
f6_assessments.q2:
Success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

I agree

f6_assessments.q0:
Delivering solutions that have an impact in multiple regions, countries, and continents aligns with the Cardano mission of growing the global Cardano community.
I agree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
There are several geographically specific teams in the community. I am unaware of any animosity between the teams and all this solution requires is that they work together towards a solution that benefits them all.
I strongly agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question. The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria. 
I strongly agree that success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: One of Cardano's missions is to have a global impact. Diminishing geopolitical constraint is a key issue to be faced in order to reach the goal
f6_assessments.q1: We'd need to have a team at Emurgo coming to peer review such proposals, and evaluate their impact. Plus, a political science expert team would be helpful in determining the feasibility of the proposals for this challenge
f6_assessments.q2: The success criteria are vague. It would be best to have an example. Plus, the key metrics is based mostly on number of projects/participants rather than the achievements of a potential proposal within a challenge

importance: This is important to Cardano because it places emphasis on the socio-economic and political identity of everyone.
success: Successful proposals will be able to deliver shared solutions that have an impact in multiple regions, countries, and continents.
